profile.name: Eugene Vyborov
profile.industry: AI Agent Systems & Business Process Automation
key_objectives: Scale Ability.ai's autonomous AI agent system
Help founders and entrepreneurs scale faster with AI Agents
Empower businesses to automate complex processes
Grow the Ability AI Agent Hub platform

background.education: Master's Degree in Computer Science (AI specialization) - Dnipro National University (2002-2007)
background.entrepreneur_type: Three-time founder with two successful exits
background.leadership_experience: Built and led teams from 5 to 100+ people with 90%+ retention rates

preferences.communication_style: Direct, professional, focused on efficiency and results

telegram.description: Primary notification channel for urgent items requiring immediate attention

notification_file.description: Full detailed reports stored in notifications/ directory

key_facts: Working in AI field since 2007
Three-time founder with two successful exits
Specialized in building high-performance teams (90%+ retention)
Master's in Computer Science with AI specialization
Guest lecturer at National University of Singapore (2020)
Former Techstars Technical Associate (2016)
Business mentor for Ukrainian startups (2014-2018)
Speaker and thought leader in AI entrepreneurship
YouTube channel (evgeniy.vyborov@gmail.com): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU5fgVZhh3ss9FCRkLXtcdg
Planning US trip November 15 - December 15, 2025 for conferences, sales, and investor meetings on West Coast

2025-10-27: TJ (immigration attorney) consultation - Recommended O-1 visa pathway converting to EB-1 green card. Multi-step process: 1) Start with O-1 visa, 2) Change status to EB-1 while in US, 3) Final green card step. Alternative: Same national interest waiver option used 5 years ago. Cost breakdown: O-1 = $13K attorney + $13.5K fees + $3.5K processing = ~$17K total. EB-1 conversion = additional $14K. Final green card step for Eugene and wife = additional ~$12K. Total pathway cost ~$43K. Key advantage: No need to return to Ukrainian embassy.
Q3 2025 Financial Status: $593,932 liquidity, $56,600/month burn, 10.5 months runway, $3.3M+ pipeline (as of Sept 30, 2025)

Three working lead generation channels: (1) AI Assessment Funnel via Meta Ads (~$500 per SQL), (2) Outbound campaign (6,000+ emails sent), (3) Content & Personal Brand (20K+ LinkedIn, 5K+ YouTube, 10K+ students)
Personal brand is the most effective lead generation engine - doubling down on content creation, podcast appearances, speaking engagements
Four core solution areas: Customer Support Automation, Marketing Automation & Content Creation, Ad Management, Sales Process Automation
Q4 2025 target: $65,000 monthly accounts receivable to reach breakeven
Mid-market B2B sales cycles are 30-60 days with summer slowdown (July-August decision-making halt)
Every customer implementation is exceeding expectations with measurable ROI and expansion conversations
Ability Inc (US) raised $1.5M with SMRK as lead investor
Ability Estonia holds ~450k as personal investment vehicle with no corporate tax structure
Ability Ukraine has $100k Google grant (in Hryvnia) - priority is to spend this on Ukrainian contractors
Legal counsel: Greyer Law (US - unresponsive), Barbasin Law (EU/Estonia), Sergey Pershman (US immigration)
Banking: Mercury (US), Payoneer (Estonia - needs upgrade), PrivatBank (Ukraine), Activa Bank (personal Portugal)
Document storage: Google Drive (US/Ukraine), Dropbox (Estonia/personal)
Portuguese NIF: 310918294, US SSN: 782-83-8264
Previous O1 visa expired Jan 2020, currently on B1/B2 visa, may reapply for O1
Estonia entity has overdue tax report and KYC documents pending
Ukraine UkrSib bank account needs to be closed

past_decisions.rationale: Built to $30M+ in contracted sales, 300+ customers, $40B+ annually processed
past_decisions.outcome: Successful acquisition, recognized as Leader in AI/ML by IDC

past_decisions.rationale: Leverage AI expertise to help businesses automate full processes with autonomous agents
past_decisions.outcome: Launched autonomous AI agent system and Agent Hub platform

past_decisions.decision: Put Ability.AI Ads project on hold
past_decisions.rationale: Not showing customer traction needed, focus is critical at this stage. CPO moved on, one engineer departed, one returned to core business. Saves costs and concentrates team on proven solutions.
past_decisions.outcome: Stronger, more unified company with clearer focus

past_decisions.decision: Shift strategy from growth-at-all-costs to sustainable breakeven
past_decisions.rationale: 10.5 months runway, bringing in revenue that extends runway, strong implementations create expansion opportunities, breakeven gives control of timeline and destiny

past_decisions.decision: Focus on personal brand as primary lead generation engine
past_decisions.rationale: Most effective engine for lead generation proven by results. Multi-channel approach ensures not dependent on single source.
past_decisions.outcome: Doubling down on content creation, podcast appearances, speaking engagements, webinars, agent-powered nurturing of 4,000+ contacts

project_overviews.name: Ability.ai

project_overviews.name: Personal Brand & Content
project_overviews.description: Content creation focused on AI agents, business automation, and entrepreneurship. Recent projects include Context Rot video and Project Kami Claude Code demo.

calendar_check.description: Review upcoming calendar events and provide a summary
calendar_check.prompt: Check my calendar (eugene@ability.ai) for the next 24 hours. Provide a summary of upcoming meetings including: times, attendees, and any potential conflicts or preparation needs. Save the summary to the notification file specified in the system prompt.

email_priority_scan.description: Scan inbox for high-priority or urgent emails
email_priority_scan.prompt: Search my inbox (eugene@ability.ai) for emails from the last 15 minutes. Look for messages containing urgent keywords or from priority senders. If any high-priority items are found, create a summary in the notification file. If nothing urgent, note that in the notification.

simple_test.description: Simple test task to verify scheduler is working
simple_test.prompt: Create a test report showing the current date/time and a brief system status. List the working directory contents and save a simple notification confirming the scheduler works.

email_calendar_monitor.name: email_calendar_monitor
email_calendar_monitor.prompt: Check emails from last 20 minutes for urgent items (keywords: urgent, asap, critical, immediate) and scan calendar for next 24 hours for conflicts or prep needs. Cross-reference notification_tracker to avoid duplicates. Document all urgent items in the notification file with clear priority indicators.
email_calendar_monitor.description: Monitors email and calendar, documents urgent items in notification files

notification_tracker.description: Tracks recent notifications to prevent duplicates. Each entry: {id, type, summary, timestamp, status}
notification_tracker.note: Agent checks this before sending notifications. Mark as resolved when action taken.
